tracks.text: Text on a plane reads "tes of America"
Dead shuffle past a conference room on the plane. A dead woman wears pearls and a red dress. A bald dead man wears a suit and sunglasses.
Conference room
The advisor lurches and coughs blood.
An officer with one stripe nods.
He pulls a gun and points. The president stairs at the chairman.
The president brings his hand to his forehead, chest, and shoulders.
The plane reading "United States of America" flies through the clouds.
Below, smoke rises from fires spanning across a city. Flames burn along the banks of a river, casting the Washington Monument in orange.
Intro
The girl sits in Hirano's lap and kicks her feet.
The humvee drives, it's wheels submerged in water. Laundry flies from a rope, including underwear with the text, Act 8, The DEAD way home
In daytime, the humvee drives across the river.
Takagi looks through binoculars from the roof.
Rei wakes up next to Takashi. She eyes him, smiles, and blushes.
Rei looks down. Saiko is stretched out on the seat, her head in Takashi's lap. She moans in her sleep. Rei glares.
The humvee drives up the river bank. Takagi looks up and down the shore with her binoculars. Up the embankment, apartment buildings stand calmly.
She squeezes Takashi's cheek.
Rei looks down. Takashi follows her gaze and jumps. Saiko looks up from his lap, drool running down her mouth.
Rei presses herself against Takashi. Saiko blinks, blushes, and rubs her mouth.
He looks down at her bare legs.
She blushes and looks away. Later, Hirano sits on the roof.
Takashi looks up
Alice covers her skirt.
He blinks
Rei grabs Alice
The boys stand on the hill side of the car.
Takashi looks down
A pile of clean, girly clothes.
Girls undress
The girls finish dressing.

Laced up thigh high boots lead to purple stockings to a slitted miniskirt. Saiko wears her school shirt. Rei holds a gun and wears her school shirt, a green mini skirt, and knee pads. Takagi wears a white shirt, unbuttoned to her belly button, and a green microskirt. Shizuka wears a loose, white shirt sans bra and an orange mini skirt. The boys stare. Rei holds a black M1A rifle.
Knife mounts to gun
Takashi and Hirano hold guns and stand at the bottom of the embankment. They look at each other, nod, and run up the steep slope. They stop on a road on top.
They stop on an empty road.
Takashi waves down to Shizuka in the humvee.
She drives up the hill.
Hirano looks up at the car summitting over him.
The car drifts past him to a stop.
crashed cars and blood splatter
He smiles gently and nods. She smiles up at him.
Rei sits next to Takashi and rests her breasts on the rifle. They bounce as the humvee drives down the road. The pair of them sit on the roof, looking over the back.
They pass a store with colorful motorcycles with a sign reading Shinjo
Takagi looks away
Takashi looks at the sky
Sakura petals drift in the air. They drive over a quiet stream. Petals gather on the empty streets. A sign reads, No Parking
Sakura petals drift over a steep hill. A modern-style 2 story cement building sits on a small lot with bansai-cut trees and a stone wall.
An empty, pedestrian path with stairs cuts between buildings on a hill.
On the humvee roof, Takashi looks up at the sky. Rei stares out, over the back.
Takashi's bangs blow in the wind. His eyelids slowly lower.
Dozens of dead stand on the street.
Takashi and Rei hold onto the rooft. Dead fly over the hood.
White lines
She drifts. The side of the car presses zombies against a white, wire net.
Blood splatters
She presses
Takashi and Rei jolt on the roof. The car drives to a wall.
She brakes hard.
Rei flies forward.
Takashi reaches out a hand.
Their fingers touch
and part
Rei bounces on the hood of the car and rolls forward across the road.
She lies on the ground, the gun tethered to her by a strap.
She looks up. Dead shuffle toward her.
She stares, eyes wide
Text, High School of the DEAD

A series of high rise residential buildings line a wide street. 3 pedestrian sky walks join over the main road, forming a circle. Dead shuffle under the circle. They approach Rei, lying on the ground in front of a net made of wires.
He stumbles back
2 drop
2 drop
2 more
He pulls one from his pocket. Others roll out.
He upper cuts a dead
She strikes another
Takashi grabs at a bullet, but it rolls further. A dead steps on it.
A dense wall of dead approaches the group
Rei winces on the ground. Takashi looks back at her, then stares away from us.
He drops his gun and embraces Rei. He clutches her around the back, and fingers the holster strap to her gun.
He grabs the gun, jerking her by the tether.
He rests the gun over her chest, wraps his arms around her breasts, and aims the rifle at the dead.
Her breasts bounce pointedly on every shot.
In slow motion, a bullet flies through the air. Saiko leaps up in the air, legs spread, and the bullet flies between her thighs.
Saiko strikes a dead then leaps into a backflip. Takashi looks across Rei's chest, fires, and the bullet flies between Saiko's breasts as the ripple in the air.
Saiko completes her flip and strikes a dead. Rei's breasts ripple from the force of the gun.
He releases the magazine.
Alice cowers in the car.
She nods and crawls into the back.
Zero barks from next to the magazines.
She holds out magazines of large, pointed bullets. Angelic light shines over her. Hirano wears a determined expression.
She jumps out of the car.
She looks forward. A dead man stands inches from her face. Saiko swings, and discolored fluid splashes over Takagi's body and hair.
A bullet flies through the air.
A magazine drops to the ground.
Hirano looks through a scope.
Dead bang on the window in front of Shizuka.
A dead grabs at Saiko's shirt
Takagi wields the shotgun like a bat.
Takashi holds the gun over Rei's chest.
Alice sits in the fetal position in the humvee
Dead reach forward
Takagi steps back from the endless sea of dead.
Takashi and Rei close their eyes.
Zero leaps off the roof
He bites a dead's leg
The dead moves. Takashi hangs his head. He looks at Rei, who looks up at him.
He closes his eyes.
Takagi steps back and raises the shotgun.
Takashi catches it.
He takes it from her and walks forward.
He screams, runs, leaps, and strikes.
Saiko runs and jump kicks.
She foot sweeps a dead, and pulls her sword out of its face.
He strikes a dead. He runs, swinging and striking.
She runs alongside him, striking and flipping.
She hits a street lamp.
They run up stairs towards the pedestrian sky walk. Dead shuffle slowly up the stairs after them.
Dead near the humvee turn.
They leap over a gap between walkways.
Dead shuffle toward the car
Takagi trips and falls back.
Hirano pulls Alice onto the roof.
He fox smiles
Text, Act 8, The DEAD way home
outro
Hirano holds Alice on the humvee roof
A boot stomps
Men in uniform rush.

A gun barrel points between wire. Fluid erupts, pushing dead back. A ladder props up over the wire net, resting on the humvee roof. A uniformed man climbs up, and fires from the roof. Takashi points from a block away.
A boot pushes wire down. Takagi looks up.
Takagi carries Rei. She looks up at the masked person.
Shizuka bows respectfully.
The dead fighter takes off her helmet, revealing long pink hair.
Takagi runs, leaps, and flies into her mother's arms.
Rei watches as Takashi and Saiko turn and run between buildings. Her bangs blow in the wind.
Takashi and Saiko parkour off a railing. They run between cars.
They run up a hill, striking dead.
Text, to be continued
Text, preview
Texte, Act 9, The Sword and DEAD

Post-episode footnote: The name Alice was converted to Japanese pronunciation. The sound "li" converts to "ri", and the "s" sound converts to "su". Therefore, "Alice" converts to "a ri su". The English voice actors are mimicking the Japanese voice actor's pronunciation of the English name Alice.]
